Title: The Hard Part
Plot: Hiro and Ando's determination is put to the test. Nathan wants to win the election and he's taking drastic measures to ensure that he will. This episode will feature Sylar, his home life, and where he came from. Jessica and D.L. discover some of the stuff that Linderman wants from them and Micah. Also there is a new hero who is supposed to be holding the key to stopping Sylar.
GuestStars: Jackson Wurth, Geno Monteiro, Justin Evans, Rena Sofer, Ellen Greene
